Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Oceancrest Avenue, north of the Bushman Estate.
Room.LongDescription: The magnificent Bushman Estates run on the south side of Oceancrest Avenue from Amberton Lane to the east, all the way to Lankshire Parkway in the west. The large estate and farm provides Oceancrest with much of the basic fruits and vegetables the city needs to survive nutritionally.
